content.rendered:
There are many life-saving Android utility apps out there, but which ones do you actually need? Here’s our curated list of the top free utility apps you need on your phone.

1. Dumpster

Dumpster is the greatest utility app for undeleting photos, videos, documents, and more. Accidentally deleted an importanfile? With Dumpster you can instantly recover anything deleted off of your device. Even files you deleted before installing the app. 

2. Cover

Cover is the one and only photo & video vault that scans devices for explicit content 24/7. Meaning, when the app is installed, it’s state of the art machine learning technology will run consistently in the background actively monitoring and hiding any explicit content that’s detected.  

3. Todoist

Todoist is one of the greatest utility & productivity apps available. This beautifully designed to-do list and organizer has helped people accomplish over 1.5 billion tasks and counting! Whether it’s organizing a new marketing project, remembering what you need to get for groceries, or organizing your day-to-day life, Todist is perfect for you. 

4. Betternet VPN

Betternet VPN free and unlimited VPN proxy available to use for all Android devices. Betternet VPN masks your IP address, encrypts internet usage, turns public Wi-Fi into a private network and helps unblock sites and apps on your Android phone so you can access content safely and anonymously.  

5. Headspace

If you don’t already have Headspace, we highly recommend you install it now! Headspace is the easiest way to incorporate mediation and focused breathing into your daily routine. The app has hundreds of sessions available on health, personal growth, stress management, and anxiety relief. 

6. Focus To-Do

80% of results come from 20% of the work! Focus To-Do is a Pomodoro Timer that motivates and helps you stay focused to get what you need done. This utility app is great for studying, working from home, exercising, and almost anything you need to stay focused on. 

7. 1Password

One of the easiest ways to protect your device is to make sure your passwords are optimized at the right length. It’s also important to actually remember all of your passwords! If you have different passwords for different platforms, we highly recommend utilizing 1Password to keep all of them in one place. 

Download Cover the leading photo & video vault today!
